0.1.name: wordpress/piwikcounter
0.1.description: PiwikCounter is a Counter which needs a Piwik installation under your control. Without it, it won't work. It get's its data through Piwiks API and caches the amount of visits until yesterday and just adds the amount of visits for the actual date.
